name: Primary
aboutCourse:
One year course
Approximately 4 days a week in school throughout the school year plus
1 day a week at Marjon University
In school placements take place in two schools within the Tavistock area -Autumn & Summer term in one school & Spring term in second school across both Key stages
Assessments are made by Marjon tutors with School Headteacher & Class Teacher
interviewProcess:
Interviews will take place at Horrabridge Primary & Nursery School
There is one interview which will include :
A formal interview (with Head teacher of Horrabridge and Marjon tutor)
A teaching session and a literacy skills test
howSchoolPlacementsWork:
Age range 4 -11 (Primary) KS1 & KS2
Attend two schools in total (within the Tavistock Learning Area)
We have 5 partner schools with the Learning Community
2 terms will be spent in one school & one term in the second school
Placement schools are selected on availability and needs of student
otherRequirements:
A satisfactory DBS (Disclosure and Barring check)
We have a responsibility to ensure that trainees have the health & physical capacity to teach. Candidates must meet the secretary of State's requirements for physical and mental fitness to teach as detailed in 'Fit to Teach' by completing an online medical questionairre
